title: In what Patch will Sandbox Mode will be released?

replies.body: I'm not quite sure! I haven't seen any announcements about it hitting the live servers at the moment. Be sure to keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any further info on this as it becomes available. ^.^

Thanks bunches, i'm excited for it expecially sense then I can configure my build for maximum heals (Towards me and the injured) when I play Soraka that doesn't require waiting over and extensive period of test periods in game and farming gold just for the items.{{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:26}}
